basic.production: Gansu, Shaanxi, Henan, Hubei, Sichuan, Guizhou, Yunnan
basic.blooming: Flowering period May-September, fruiting period June-October
basic.color: Flower color white, fruit color green

maintenance.soil: Soil with rich organic matter and strong abilities of holding water and fertility
maintenance.fertilization: Apply enough base fertilizers, in vegetative stages foliar top-dressing every 3-5 days
maintenance.pruning: Creeping plants, many branches, need to be put up
